w21z47txmr.directions: B1, Beach Station carpark. Yellow zone. Take the escalator opposite the information counter to the basement carpark. Turn right. There are separate rooms for male & female with saying "Prayer Room". There's a nearby water point for ablution just to the right of the musollah.
w21z47txmr.provisions: Slippers, Praying Mats, Qiblat Indicator, Wudu' Area, Fans
w21z47txmr.name: Sentosa Island, Beach Station
